headlines.description: Bruno Fernandes scored his first Manchester United goal before Anthony Martial added an exquisite second in a 3-0 win over Watford on Sunday.

video.headline: Why Martial's the type of player that gets managers sacked

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL FCTV (Why Martial's the type of player that gets managers sacked) 2020/2 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: Fernandes nets first Utd goal in win over Watford

headlines.description: Diogo Jota struck twice as Wolverhampton Wanderers pushed Norwich City deeper towards the drop with a 3-0 win over the Premier League's bottom club
headlines.shortLinkText: Jota double for Wolves pushes Norwich deeper into trouble

headlines.description: Arsenal edged past Everton in a 3-2 goal fest that saw Andre Gomes make his return after suffering a horror injury in November.

video.headline: How the 'Arteta effect' is taking hold at Arsenal

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL FCTV (How the 'Arteta effect' is taking hold at Arsenal) 2020/2/23 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: Auba brace edges Arsenal past Everton
